title: Ukraine fights on in Sievierodonetsk as Russia's 'surrender' ultimatum passes
content:
1. Ukraine fights on in Sievierodonetsk as Russia's 'surrender' ultimatum passes  Reuters
  2. Russia destroys every bridge leading to Ukrainian city of Severodonetsk - BBC News  BBC News
  3. EU looks for natural gas alternative to Russia; fighting rages in Severodonetsk  CNBC
  4. Russian Forces Destroy Last Bridge to Key Eastern Ukrainian City  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Ukraine News: As Battle Grows Desperate, U.S. Says It Won’t Push Kyiv Into Talks  The New York Times

localize.title: ウクライナは、ロシアの「降伏」最後通告を受け、シエビエロドネツクで戦い続けている。
俄罗斯的 "投降 "最后通牒通过后，乌克兰在西维罗多涅茨克继续战斗
俄羅斯的 "投降 "最後通牒通過後，烏克蘭在西維羅多涅茨克繼續戰鬥
